alert.note: Alert for Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:17AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Crawford and northeastern Sequoyah Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 317 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Muldrow, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Van Buren... Cedarville... Muldrow... Roland... Moffett... Short... Dora... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 323 and 328. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
